notesStmt.note: Slight tidemark at head. Recurrent damp damage with contractions, losses and a dark brittle margin. Occasional surface abrasion or delamination, a few deliberate erasures. A few pleats slightly obscuring text. Numerous edge tears and wear. A few old repairs, with losses. Usage stains, slight mould spots and a few areas with liquid trickles.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
